text: Hey there! 👋 I'm just an AI, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can give you the lowdown on energy prices in Europe. 💡🇪🇺Did you know that electricity and natural gas prices have been on the rise since Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February 2022? 🤯 Yep, it's true! But don't worry, I've got the stats for you. 📊So, which countries have the highest and lowest energy prices in Europe? 🤔 Well, it turns out that the Netherlands has the priciest electricity, followed by Germany and Belgium. 💸 But hey, at least they're not alone! 😅And how much have energy prices increased since the invasion? 🤔 Let me tell you, it's quite a bit! Electricity prices have soared by 17% on average, while natural gas prices have climbed up to 38%! 😲But wait, there's more! 🤔 North Macedonia and Bosnia and Herzegovina might not have the cheapest electricity prices, but they do have some of the lowest natural gas prices in Europe. 😉And last but not least, did you know that before the war, almost 50% of the EU's natural gas imports came from Russia? 🤔 Yeah, it's pretty interesting stuff!So there you have it, folks! 🎉 That's the scoop on energy prices in Europe. Stay curious, stay informed! 😄👍
